about_the_game: DISCLAIMER: This is a PRE-ALPHA Build, which in short means that most of UI and ART are either missing or placeholder. Same applies for in-game content, and (the lack of) tutorials of any sort. Feedback is greatly appreciated!
detailed_description: DISCLAIMER: This is a PRE-ALPHA Build, which in short means that most of UI and ART are either missing or placeholder. Same applies for in-game content, and (the lack of) tutorials of any sort. Feedback is greatly appreciated!
name: Endless Tactics Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later are supported
  • Processor: Intel i5/AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later are supported
  • Processor: Intel i7/AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: DISCLAIMER: This is a PRE-ALPHA Build, which in short means that most of UI and ART are either missing or placeholder. Same applies for in-game content, and (the lack of) tutorials of any sort. Feedback is greatly appreciated!
